actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act with respect to the issuance of social security cards.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to direct the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to issue a social security card made of banknote paper to each individual at the time of issuing a social security account number to such individual.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act with respect to the issuance of social security cards.
